argument.description: An expression of any data type.

returnType: bigint if expression has an nvarchar(max), varbinary(max), or varchar(max) data type; otherwise int.
description: This function returns the number of bytes used to represent any expression.
sample:
-- Uses AdventureWorks  

SELECT length = DATALENGTH(EnglishProductName), EnglishProductName  
FROM dbo.DimProduct  
ORDER BY EnglishProductName;  
GO
